Class PropertySet

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.io.properties.PropertySet
public class PropertySet extends Object
A container for properties, accessed via type-safe PropertyKeys. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

      Returns:
